name: No Hallow's Eve
description:
It's almost Halloween Night and you are the only one between the horde of monsters and the Necronomicon! Be a tiny exorcist in this fast-paced adventure where you have to think on your feet and use the right tool for the job . 

Dash through ghosts, shoot werewolves, exorcise demons and throw garlic at vampires without missing a beat and see how high you can score, all the while protecting the dark secrets of the Necronomicon from falling in the wrong hands..!
